scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n API,WEB -c blue,green "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.dev:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm --workspace backend/api run start:dev
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:api
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm --workspace backend/api run start:prod
